systems.name: Artifact System
systems.description: A high-level progression system allowing players to customize tank power through Tech Parts.
systems.mechanics: Players can equip 5 artifacts across fixed slots (Engine, Weapon, Armor, CPU, Energy Core). Artifacts have main stats and randomized sub-stats. Enhancement and fusion systems allow for further customization.
systems.objectives: Provide long-term progression, encourage creative builds, maintain balance by contributing 20% of total power.
interactions: Enhancement increases artifact level and randomizes sub-stats.
Fusion combines artifacts for higher rarity.
systems.source_note: Overview section of the Artifact System documentation.

systems.name: Set System
systems.description: Artifacts are grouped into sets with unique bonuses.
systems.mechanics: Equipping multiple pieces from the same set activates bonuses (e.g., 2-piece or 5-piece effects).
systems.objectives: Encourage strategic combinations of artifacts for tactical advantages.
interactions: Overdrive Set boosts attack after eliminating an enemy.
Guardian Set provides a shield when HP drops below 30%.

logic_rules.summary: Artifact enhancement increases level and modifies sub-stats.
logic_rules.description: Artifacts can be enhanced from Lv.1 to Lv.20. Each enhancement guarantees success but randomizes sub-stat growth.
logic_rules.effect: Artifact gains levels and randomized sub-stat improvements.

logic_rules.summary: Fusion combines three artifacts of the same rarity into a higher rarity artifact.
logic_rules.description: Three artifacts of the same rarity and type can be fused into one artifact of higher rarity. Success rates decrease with rarity.
logic_rules.effect: Produces a new artifact of higher rarity or returns a random artifact if failed.

requirements.title: Long-Term Progression Goals
requirements.description: Players should aim for perfect stat rolls or Mythic Overclock bonuses as part of their long-term goals.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Players achieve optimal artifact builds over time.

requirements.title: Maintain Core Gameplay Balance
requirements.description: Ensure artifacts contribute no more than 20% of total tank power to avoid overshadowing core gameplay mechanics.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Artifact system remains balanced and does not disrupt core gameplay.
